title: Why is Remi allowed to play in LCS while not in uniform?
body:
Seeing her play alongside her teammates, but being the only one dressed casually kinda makes her stick out like a sore thumb, and lowers the professional integrity of the event. It's like if you went to a hockey game and one dude on a team was wearing jeans and a tank top while everyone else was dressed properly.

So, why does Remi get to wear tank tops when the rest of the team wears their professional uniforms? I thought there was a dress code put in place to stop certain players (Dyrus did it I think?) from showing up in unprofessional attire, such as sweat pants and pajamas?
